name: Baldi's basics TUD Public Beta
description:
Baldi's basics TUD Public Beta is here.  2 things I want to say.

1. This isn't Version 2 Public Beta. This is a 1.2.2.1 update Public Beta

2. I don't own this mod or file, SWA is the one who made this.

The reason why I am re-uploading this mod is cause I want to make it easier for people to find it and play it. Anyways, enjoy this mod :D.

Original mod: https://seenwonderalex.itch.io/baldis-basics-tud

Original user: https://seenwonderalex.itch.io/

Original BBIEAL: https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics
